questions.question: Worker motivation can be defined as

choices.answer: employees working hard because they fear losing their jobs
workers working hard to do their best for the business
employees travelling a long way to get to work
workers work hard just when their manager is watching

questions.question: People work hard for all of the following reasons except

choices.answer: earning money.
having social contact
gaining recognition
watching TV

questions.question: Taylor's views on worker motivation suggests that:

choices.answer: workers will work hard when they have clean conditions
workers will work hard when they enjoy work socially
workers will work harder when they are paid more
workers work harder when they are given extra responsibility

questions.question: According to Maslow's hierarchy of needs, workers' self-fulfilment will be reached when

choices.answer: they are given challenging  work to do and are recognised
they are paid a higher salary than other employees
work in groups and are given the chance to make decisions
they have job security

questions.question: Job satisfaction can be defined as:

choices.answer: being happy when work is finished
being happy when more jobs come in
being happy when an unemployed person finds a job
being happy at work because of the type of job being done

questions.question: Which of the following did Herzberg believe is the best example of job enrichment?

choices.answer: the worker is given more work to do and is paid more
the worker is allowed to change jobs
the worker is given more physical jobs to complete
the worker is encouraged to take more responsibility at work

questions.question: The best definition of wages calculated by time rate is:

choices.answer: the hours worked multiplied by the hourly rate of pay
multiplying the amount produced by a rate per unit of output
a salary paid each month
wages added to the fringe benefits

questions.question: An advantage of the time rate system is that:

choices.answer: it encourages workers to produce as much as possible
it is easy to calculate from a time sheet
it encourages workers to get the job finished quickly
income tax does not have to be paid on earnings

questions.question: One disadvantage of the piece rate system of wages is that:

choices.answer: workers have to fill in detailed time sheets
high output is discouraged as workers will receive more pay
quality may be a problem if workers work too fast
little time is wasted by workers

questions.question: An advantage to workers of being paid a salary rather than a piece rate is

choices.answer: there is more security of payment
higher pay results from higher output
workers will always receive a higher salary than piece rate
working longer hours always means higher salary

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a fringe benefit?

choices.answer: Higher pay
Free Meals at the canteen
Annual bonus
Commission
